news.title: Target to provide pucca houses to all poor by 2024: Madhya Pradesh CM
news.para: In the program, one lakh 29 thousand 292 beneficiaries of the state were benefitted under Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (Urban). In this, the assistance amount of 627 crores was transferred to 79 thousand 39 beneficiaries in their accounts.

news.title: Andhra Pradesh launches integrated land survey using hybrid technology
news.para: The survey would cover over 1.26 lakh square kilometres of land across the state, said Siddhartha Jain, commissioner, State Survey Settlement and Land Records.

news.title: Final survey of Noida International Airport land set to begin soon
news.para: The Noida administration, Yamuna International Airport Private Limited and Noida International Airport Limited will begin the survey soon.

news.title: SPV of state-run companies may be tasked to redevelop land bank with sick PSUs
news.para: As per a plan shared by the government officials privy to the development, non-core assets including land and buildings of several weaker PSUs may be handed over to specialised state-run agencies for redevelopment to realise higher value or for sale through a bidding process.

news.title: BMC deputy law officer makes flat owners tenants, booked
news.para: After having learnt of the anomaly, a 76-year-old Suman Shah finally managed to lodge a First Information Report with Borivali’s Kasturba Marg police station.

news.title: Ghaziabad: Over 1,500 Madhuban allottees may have to pay more for plots
news.para: This is because the GDA board has approved the development authority’s proposal to recover the extra costs that the latter had to incur in its housing scheme on account of enhanced compensation to farmers whose land was acquired for the project.

news.title: Pune: 98% of land acquired for PMRDA metro line; project start date soon
news.para: Once the date is announced, work will speed up and should be completed in 40 months. As per PMRDA officials, the plan has also been approved by the Pune Unified Metropolitan Transport Authority (PUNTA).

news.title: MahaRERA directs Ekta Housing to refund buyer after the project is ready
news.para: The developer in its argument pointed out that the flat buyer had mortgaged the home with a bank to avail housing loan, which the complainant was willing to obtain a No Objection Certificate to claim the refund from the realtor.

news.title: Digital khatas set to become reality in Bengaluru, may end fraud
news.para: “We are planning to introduce it in the east zone of Bengaluru some time next week followed by west, and eventually in all core areas of the city covering about 100 wards,” said special commissioner (revenue), BBMP, S Basavaraj.

news.title: MREAT dismisses Epitome Residency's appeal against refund order to Karan Oberoi
news.para: The appellate tribunal had, on March 12 this year, directed the builder, Epitome Residency, to deposit the amount in compliance with mandatory provisions of the 2017 law Real Estate (Regulation and Development) Act (RERA).

news.title: Gandhinagar civic body begins drive to clear encroachments
news.para: “We have begun property survey in newly added areas to unearth property tax violations. We will launch an anti-encroachment drive as soon as the survey is complete,” said a GMC official.

news.title: Chennai corporation to issue notices to office complexes with pending property tax dues
news.para: Zonal level revenue officials of the civic body have started a drive to collect tax arrears from high-value defaulters, those who owe more than Rs 50,000 and Rs 1 lakh.

news.title: NBCC to sell unused FAR of Amrapali projects for Rs 1,500 crore
news.para: NBCC is involved in the completion of 23 Amrapali housing projects, the cost of completion of which is estimated at about Rs 8,500 crore.

news.title: Gurugram civic body commissioner tells officials to improve property tax recovery
news.para: In a meeting held with the zonal taxation department and enforcement branch officials on Friday, the commissioner directed the zonal taxation officers to improve their performance and recovery by September 15.

news.title: Fly ash ideal for manufacturing cement, concrete, bricks & tiles: NTPC
news.para: The fly ash generated at the NTPC is ideal for manufacturing cement, concrete, concrete products, bricks and tiles, claimed the general manager (ash handling) K Gopala Krishna.
